methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc: Create an abstracted account for an EOA

methods.name: saveAuthAddr
methods.desc: Save the auth addr of the EOA in state so we can rekey back to it later

methods.name: rekey
methods.desc: Rekey this contract account to the EOA

args.name: saveAuthAddrCall
args.desc: Call to saveAuthAddr() to ensure the EOA's auth addr is saved in state

args.name: flash
args.desc: Whether or not this should be a flash rekey. If true, the rekey back to this contract must done in the same txn as the call to saveAuthAddr()

methods.name: addProgram
methods.desc: Add a program to this abstracted account

args.name: globalNumUint
args.desc: The number of global uints this program requires

args.name: globalNumByteSlice
args.desc: The number of global byte slices this program requires

args.name: localNumByteSlice
args.desc: The number of local byte slices this program requires

args.name: localNumUint
args.desc: The number of local uints this program requires

methods.name: removeProgram
methods.desc: Remove a program from this abstracted account

args.name: programHash
args.desc: The hash of the program to remove

methods.name: callProgram
methods.desc: Calls one of the deploy programs for this abstracted accountTODO: Think of better way to pass ABI args

args.name: programHash
args.desc: The hash of the program to call

args.name: args
args.desc: The arguments to pass to the method
